name: Neuromouser
description:
Neuromouser - A cyberpunk cooperative game where one player hacks the level while the other sneaks and chews their way through, avoiding corporate fat cats who are trying to destroy rodent-kind!

This game was created as part of PIGSquad's Summer Slow Jam, which had a technical challenge and thematic challenge. The technical challenge was to create a 2+ cooperative game, and the thematic challenge was "Best Friend, Best Weapon".

Our Team

Joe Programming
Donald Story and Level Design
Wes Music and Level Design
